coding.display: Finding related to ability to latch on to breast for feeding

text.div: Patient:
Practitioner: 123

dosageInstruction.text: If possible by oxygen mask with reservoir at 10-15L/min
Start  2  dispersible tablet(s) Amoxicillin (250mg)   or 10 ml (250mg / 5ml syrup)    twice per day for 5 days
